amendment.description: Amendment makes technical changes to the bill; corrects a drafting error to make it clear that the Federal Aviation Administration retains its current authority to waive the requirements to obtain a license, while also making it clear that that authority does not extend to flights that carry humans; and removes the requirement that crews sign reciprocal waivers of liability.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to make technical corrections.
